heaviest_rainfall.status: Record-breaking rain fell on 04 January 2025 with a total accumulation of 36.8mm over 37.2 hours and falling at a rate of 4.6mm per hour at times.

heaviest_rainrate.status: On 02 September 2025, the rain fell at an exceptional rate, peaking at 27.0mm per hour, the heaviest downpour recorded.  A total of 21.19mm fell over the 15.0 hour storm.

longest_rain.status: The longest rain storm on record lasted 37.2 hours on 04 January 2025 when 36.8mm of rain fell and at one point was falling at 4.6mm per hour.

most_lightning.status: Since 11 April 2025, the day with the most lightning strikes is 07 September 2025 when 23 were seen.

nearest_lightning.status: When lightning struck on 13 May 2025, its position was recorded at just 4.97 miles away, the closest on record.

storm.status: There is a storm around.  It's the first significant stormy weather event since 20 September 2025.

top_10_dry.status: The longest dry period started on 24 April 2025 and lasted for 19 days.

top_10_rainy.status: The longest rainy period started on 30 November 2024 and lasted for 10 days.

cold_snaps.status: There is not a cold snap right now.  There have been 6 this year, compared to a usual average of 3.7.

extreme.status: The largest temperature difference recorded was 26.7°C on 29 April 2025.  On that date the temperature reached 27.1°C and fell to 0.4°C.

heatwaves.status: There is no heatwaves at the moment.  This year has experienced 6 heatwavess, with an average of 1.9 per year.

tropical.status: The last observed tropical night was 18 July 2025, making a total of only 62 times since 1973.

average.status: The current average daily wind direction is southerly (182°), which differs from the daily average south-westerly (233.0°) by approximately 51.0 degrees.    In the UK, a southerly wind usually brings milder, moist air from the Atlantic.

gusts.status: The largest wind gust ever was on 13 October 2012 with a value of 93.7 mph.

run.status: The highest wind run ever seen is 1737 miles on 21 October 2012.

speed.status: The top recorded wind speed is 93.7 mph on 13 October 2012.

top_10_windy.status: The longest windy period started on 11 October 2012 and lasted for 21 days.

summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 9.6°C) and outside temperature (down 8.0°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm) and cloud levels (up 456 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 86.5m lower than yesterday, 22.9m higher than the past week, 455.5m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 841m minimum and 1909m maximum, with an average of 1374.2m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1351.2m and 1829.7m.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; chilly temperatures are forecasted. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and near calm conditions. Chance of light rain, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and the light is absent. Weather could become unsettled.
